document_data.name: Seeming
document_data.Effects: A caster used this spell to alter the appearance of one or multiple creatures. The targeted creatures had to be within 30 feet (9 meters) and within sight of the caster. The spell altered the physical appearance of the creatures, as well as their equipment such as clothing, armor and weapons.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: ''Seeming'' was unkown to the [[arcanist]]s of ancient [[Netheril]].<ref> By the 1360s [[DR]] it was considered an uncommon spell in the magical community of [[Faer√ªn]],<ref> while it was commonly used in [[Zakhara]].<ref>{{AQ-time}}
